title: Tomato and rocket bruschetta
ingredients: ['20 plum tomatoes', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '8 cloves garlic, minced', '1 (100g) bag wild rocket, chopped', '20 sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, drained and chopped', '3 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
